Articles.Content:
Just a few simple suggestions for future science equipment:

- photographic camera

- video camera

- laser/drill (with robot arm -- that would be amazing)

- spectrometer

- radiation detector
Radiometer definitely would be a necessity ... after all we would want to know how much rad our Kerbals or probes get on Eve

Also:

* Probe-based (robotic) sample collection

* Satellite-based mapping/scanning (I think I might have seen this in the what-not-to-suggest list...)
